sentence.Network_en: Another prevention method was through elaborate locking rings which made meters non - removable, except with special keys.

sentence.Network_en: Key removable in locked position only. Spring loaded clip - in pawl.

entry.tran: 可移动的;可拆装的;可活动的
entry.def: A removable part of something is a part that can easily be moved from its place or position.

example.ex: ...a cake tin with a removable base.

means.word_mean: 1. capable of being removed or taken away or dismissed;
